name: Long Cardigan
description: Long, fine-knit cardigan in soft fabric with wool content. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and no buttons. Ribbing at cuffs, back of neck, and hem. Polyester content is recycled.

name: Loose-knit Cardigan
description: Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. Polyester content is recycled.

name: Knit Cardigan
description: Long cardigan in soft knit fabric with wool content. Long sleeves, high slits at sides, and ribbing at cuffs and hem. No buttons. Polyester content is recycled.

name: Slacks
description: Ankle-length slacks in woven, stretch fabric. Regular waist, concealed elasticized waistband, and zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, mock welt back pockets, and tapered legs.

name: Ankle-length Slacks
description: Slacks in woven stretch fabric. Regular waist, elastication at back of waistband, and mock welt pocket at back. Slim, ankle-length legs with creases.
